runnerData.comment: Comment:Not yet fully exposed but needs to improve; new trip today; cheekpieces added
Comment:Well beaten in low-grade hurdle last month; no great appeal back on the Flat; visor added

runnerData.breederName: Sir P Vela, Triermore Stud & New England
runnerData.comment: Comment:Opened account in this grade at Lingfield this month; obvious contender
Comment:11yo; returned from long absence with C&D second on recent stable debut; high on the list
Comment:Gave pretty good account when fourth over C&D this month; each-way claims at least

runnerData.breederName: S Clarke, G Parsons & A Wideson
runnerData.comment: Comment:Ran okay over 1m here this month but untested beyond that trip
Comment:Well beaten in this grade at Lingfield this month and now 0-34
Comment:Made the frame in race like this at Chelmsford last summer but others look stronger here
Comment:Made the frame in two 1m2f Lingfield handicaps this month; up in trip today; e/w claims
Comment:Well beaten in two novice races last month but this is much easier
